特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
The sessions will include a variety of learning activity styles to help students to gain and broaden their understanding English. Sessions will be conducted using the following learning styles: Lecture, Discussion, Presentation, Pair and Group work.
The main mode of teaching will be conducted using a lecture approach were students will be expected to take notes and partake in discussion activities related to the session topic. Discussion activities will initially be conducted in pairs or small groups and may then be conducted at a 'class' level.
In sessions 7 and 12 students will partake in a small group (3 or 4 students) presentation on a topic related to themes that have been discussed in class sessions.
